title: TeslaGrid
tagline: Reliability cockpit for Tesla's Supercharger network and fleet operations
problem: Managing global charging infrastructure requires real-time visibility into hardware health, localized demand spikes, and technician dispatch prioritization. Existing tools separated alert monitoring from workflow management.
description: TeslaGrid is a unified reliability cockpit designed for network operations centers (NOCs).
It combines real-time telemetry from superchargers with predictive demand forecasting.
The interface prioritizes Work Orders based on customer impact, ensuring high-traffic stations are repaired first.
impact: Unified 'Network Health' view replacing 3 disparate monitoring tools.
Predictive capacity modeling reduces wait-time spikes during holiday travel.
